pullRequest.title: [#1443] Fix XtextFormatter behaviour on different line endings.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Modify the FormattingConfigBasedStream to handle the different line
endings properly.
Implement corresponding XtextFormatterTest and
GrammarAccessExtensionsTest test cases.

Signed-off-by: Tamas Miklossy miklossy@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: I'd rather like to fix the caller of the constructor.

beforeCommit.message:
[#1443] Fix XtextFormatter behaviour on different line endings.

- Modify the FormattingConfigBasedStream to handle the different line
endings properly.
- Implement corresponding XtextFormatterTest and
GrammarAccessExtensionsTest test cases.

Signed-off-by: Tamas Miklossy <miklossy@itemis.de>
